title: Escape From The Dark Queen
description: After escaping the dungeons, Lilly wrestles with strange dreams as she tries to figure out what role she is to play in her ever expanding world. Queen Eglarth herself has recovered and now seeks revenge. But when Lilly meets the fabled creatures of the Mystical Mountains, she learns secrets which will dramatically alter her course and change her world forever.This is the long awaited sequel to the original book, The Black Fairy and The Dragonfly. Although this book is obviously aimed at younger readers, it has all the elements that older readers will enjoy as much, if not more. Competent and confident readers as young as 8 will not have much trouble reading this book and understanding its themes of courage, forgiveness, resilience, coming of age, good and evil and finding your place in a complex world.
author: Paul G. Day
